AR 9. When providing information on its policies, the undertaking shall consider whether and how its
policies address:
(a) the waste hierarchy: (a) prevention; (b) preparing for re-use; (c) recycling; (d) other
recovery, e.g., energy recovery; and (e) disposal. In this context, the waste treatment
